body:
Chapter 2179 - Chapter 2179: How Can A Loser Beg For Mercy?(2)

Chapter 2179: How Can a Loser Beg for Mercy?(2)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

—A divine assistance!

“Bang.”

Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes turned crimson, his body swelling, emitting explosive sounds.

Yet, he did not explode. Instead, his skin began to burn, releasing waves of heat and steam throughout his body.

This was not the infernal white flame but rather an acceleration of blood flow to its extreme.

A fissure appeared on his back.

A branch, adorned with a single blood-red leaf, extended from it. As it began to grow, Xu the Beast lost control.

“The moment of the hunt!”

With a swoosh, Xu Xiaoshou smirked and vanished into the Holy Path.

Even he himself was uncertain why he made such a move.

But at this moment, Xu Xiaoshou felt that he was not the only one controlling this body.

There was a mysterious power guiding him on what to do, how to strike, how to go mad and vent, epitomizing the power of blood.

“Hum!”

The blood-red sky tainted the power of the dark world.

Even those far in the First Hall of Sins smelled the scent of blood intensifying beneath their feet.

Subconsciously, everyone’s eyes flashed with a red glow, feeling as if they had plunged into a sea of corpses and blood.

The primal desire to dominate almost overwhelmed their hearts, but instead of tormenting them, it set them free.

“What’s happening?”

Someone, in a state of shock, returned to their senses, looking down to find nothing but solid ground beneath their feet—no Blood Sea, no corpses, no wreckage!

But as they raised their eyes… The sky turned crimson!

“Hum!”

The faint glow of red spread across the entire Abyss Island.

By the Vermilion Bird Gate, Five Decays of Heaven and Man, now completely covered in blood, had lost consciousness.

The Seven Trees Emperor, domineering and unreasonable, did not give any chance for negotiation. He was mercilessly squeezing the potential of Five Decays of Heaven and Man.

When Xu Xiaoshou conceived the idea of using the power of the blood tree, Five Decays of Heaven and Man lowered his head.

He died.

The next moment, his limp head suddenly jerked up.

He came back to life.

Blood-colored light burst from the eyes of Five Decays of Heaven and Man.

He sacrificed himself and empowered Xu Xiaoshou.

“Thirst, the beginning of the bestial nature!”

The deep and hoarse chants of the Saint Language echoed through the Abyss Island.

Wangze Holy Emperor, who had entered the intangible state, felt a surge of impulse in his mind.

That power was not unstoppable, but in the Abyss Island, constrained by the rules and the resistance of the Abyss Island Spirit, Wangze Holy Emperor could not consecutively take action.

This weakness was now magnified infinitely!

As Wangze Holy Emperor regained his senses, he felt something was wrong.

He intended to escape to Azure Marsh.

However, as soon as he came out of the Order of the Great Path, he saw a deep sword mark and the scene of the Blood Sea split in half.

—Blood World!

“No, this is the power of guidance…”

Wangze Holy Emperor’s eyes tightened, and his scalp tingled.

The scene was too horrifying!

Blood World could be considered as the lair of the Seven Trees Emperor on the Outer Island. What was the difference between escaping here and throwing oneself into a trap?

Just as he was about to escape again, his spiritual will trembled. A red glow flashed in Wangze Holy Emperor’s eyes, and the desire to go wild surged in his mind.

“What if I just ‘clash’ with him?”

“Xu Xiaoshou may be invincible with the power of the Four Holy Emperors, but he is fundamentally weak.”

“I just need to confront him head-on. His internal power will be muddled, and he will collapse from within…”

“Wow!” As this thought crossed his mind, a strange wolf howl resounded in his ears.

Wangze Holy Emperor suddenly woke up, but he knew the timing had already passed.

He was controlled!

Xu Xiaoshou had caught up to him!

His speed was not slower than his own, and the Seven Trees Emperor’s all-encompassing mind control had successfully magnified his inner obsession, controlling him twice.

“Then let’s clash!”

“Bring it on!”

Since it had come, we embraced it.

Wangze Holy Emperor, instead, became calm.

The Wind Rites Sutra flipped through his hands, settling on the most violent final chapter.

“Song of the Departed Moon!”

With a resounding blast, the rules of Blood World completely collapsed.

From all directions, past and present, a wind song echoed like the cries of ghosts and wolves, as if thousands of giant blades were slashing, shattering the Path Principles completely.

For tens of thousands of miles, the Blood Sea churned. As the Song of the Departed Moon descended, it pulverized the Blood Sea.

With a single blow, the structure of Blood World was perfectly rewritten. No longer a scene of a Blood Sea and a mountain of corpses, it became a pure hurricane zone.

If the nine extreme grounds of the Abyss Island were set at this moment, “Blood World” would have been removed from the list, and the “Hurricane Belt” would have led to a new chapter.

Emerging from the Holy Path, Xu Xiaoshou, who had entered the Hurricane Belt, naturally endured the invasion of all chaotic storms.

“Hiss, hiss…”

Countless cracks instantly appeared on his body, as if he had entered a wind attribute close-bounds force field, where scars and blood intertwined and bloomed.

The black dragon scales covering his body could withstand the attacks of ten, a hundred, a thousand wind blades.

But in this Hurricane Belt, the frequency of attacks was so high that it was impossible to count!

Xu Xiaoshou entered it alone, his dragon-scale armor turning into fragments in an instant.

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

“Attacked, Passive Points +9999.”

The Information Bar overflowed with pop-ups. The pain Xu Xiaoshou endured at this moment was also pushed to the extreme.

But under the stimulation of the Seven Trees Emperor’s insatiable desire, the pain did not make him retreat. Instead, it heightened his bloodthirst.

Just like Cen Qiaofu in the Eighth Palace, who dared to fight hundreds of individuals from the Cutting Path stages and higher void levels with a single Blood Tree’s Yin Branch.

The courage of an ordinary man was not shameful when breaking through the heavens made him a hero!

“Rao! Wang! ze!”

Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes were about to burst, and he let out a heart-wrenching roar, indicating that his obsession with killing at this moment had become madness.

Facing Wangze Holy Emperor, he threw a punch into the air.

Within the fist, the power of Ember Heart, Three Days Frozen Calamity, Little Blue Flower of the Tranquil Lake, sword cognition, Holy Power, and the Four Holy Emperors were compressed!
